speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Sarah from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing okay, thank you. What's this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling regarding your outstanding balance with Premier Loan Services. Can you confirm your address for me?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you! I see you have a balance of $750. When would you like to make a payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I can't pay it all at once right now. Can I set up a payment plan?

speaker: Agent
text: Of course! We can arrange that. How much would you be able to pay monthly?

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds reasonable. I can set you up with a plan for that amount. Can you confirm your phone number for our records?

speaker: Agent
text: Great! So to recap, you will pay $100 monthly. Your first payment is due next month. Thank you for your cooperation!

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you for your help. I appreciate it.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! If you have any questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
